titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the rollover period for gain from sale of a home where sale proceeds cannot be withdrawn from insolvent institution.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the suspension of the running of the two-year period allowed for the rollover of the gain realized from the sale of a home during a time when the sale proceeds cannot be withdrawn from an insolvent financial institution.
